Mirrored Glass: The Foundation of Magic Mirrors
Mirrored Glass is an essential crafting material for creating Magic Mirrors, a tool that revolutionizes item transportation and automation.

Why Make Magic Mirrors?
Effortless Item Transmission: Magic Mirrors allow you to send items instantly between paired mirrors, no matter the distance.
Simplified Automation: Place a mirror near an inventory or machine output, and another near your crafting area or storage. Items will flow seamlessly between them.
Cross-Dimensional Utility: The mirrors can even work across dimensions, making them ideal for setups spanning the Overworld, Nether, or End.
How to Craft Magic Mirrors
Craft Mirrored Glass:

Infuse regular glass with Precantatio, Vitreus, and Auram in a Crucible.
Alternatively, if you have access to an Arcane Workbench, the recipe may require additional Vis but eliminate Crucible crafting.
Combine the Mirrored Glass:

Use the Mirrored Glass to craft a pair of Magic Mirrors in your Arcane Workbench.
Make a few Magic Mirrors to simplify your logistics and experience the convenience of magical item transfer in your mystical endeavors!
